title: Off Duty Cop
description: Detective Steve St. James is never really off the clock while criminals are at work in his city.
altHero: Leslie Hunt as Detective Steve St. James, standing in window light shining through window blinds
alt1: St. James and his driver having pie and coffee in a diner
alt2: a sugar shaker flying toward the head of a mugger in a balaclava running with a purse
alt3: St. James maneuvering handcuffs on a big criminal swinging his arms
alt4: beautiful woman in handcuffs crouched by an open safe with gold and jewels spilling out
